title: Drilling Control Room (Doghouse) Design
content: The driller's cabin contains well control instrumentation critical for safe intervention. Displays must be visible, controls accessible, and information layout logical. High cognitive load during well control events demands optimal HMI design. Apply ISO 11064 standards and involve drillers in layout decisions.
openQuestions: Can the driller see all critical parameters without head movement or obstruction?
How well does the doghouse layout support high-stress decision-making?
